CustomField.description: Indicates whether related back pay transactions can be invoiced. If ‘No’, the credit/rebill process would be required. If’ Yes’, the back pay transactions can be invoiced.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether related back pay transactions can be invoiced. If ‘No’, the credit/rebill process would be required. If’ Yes’, the back pay transactions can be invoiced.
CustomField.label: Back Pay To Be Invoiced?
